Name: Tactic A
Title: Scuttlebutt
Description: Look at and reorder the top 4 cards of your deck. You may put any number on the bottom of your deck in any order.

Name: Tactic A
Title: NATO Allies
Description: Search your deck for a squadron, reveal it, and place it on a territory you control. Then shuffle your deck. You must control a territory to play this card.

Title: I Have Not Yet Begun To Fight

Name: Tactic A
Title: American Doctrine
Description: Search your deck or discard pile for a strategy card and put that card into play.

Name: Strategy A
Title: Aerial Refueling
Description: One half of squadrons under your control stationed on territories may participate in attacks each turn, rounded down.

Name: Strategy A
Title: Military Industrial Complex
Description: Whenever you lose a military asset of logistics 3 or greater, you may draw a card.

Name: Strategy A (INVALID)
Title: Semper Fidelis
Description: During any siege step, you may discard two cards from your deck to add +4 to the siege total.

Title: Disinformation Campaigns
Description: Your opponent must reveal their hand. Choose a card. They must discard that card.

Title: Disinformation Campaigns

Title: Strategic Flexibility

Name: Tactic A
Title: Rapid Mobilization
Description: Search your library for military asset cards whose combined logistics is equal to or less than 3, reveal them, and put those cards into your hand. Then shuffle your library.
